MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Gatehouse of Fleet. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am in order to replace two spans of overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55am on Friday, 05 February 2021
